languages.text: {n}Вы опознаете редкую броню, в которую облачен массивный жрец — моторизованные латы секутора. Они несут следы многих битв и отметины, обозначающие их реликварный статус. Некоторые повреждения брони выглядят весьма тяжелыми и угрожающими ее функционированию.{/n}

{n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a Secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы опознаете редкую броню, в которую облачен массивный жрец — моторизованные латы секутора. Они несут следы многих битв и отметины, обозначающие их реликварный статус. Некоторые повреждения брони выглядят весьма тяжелыми и угрожающими ее функционированию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}あなたは巨大な技術司祭が身に纏っている希少なアーマーを、セキュタープレート機甲化スーツと特定した。それには多くの戦いが刻まれており、聖遺物であると示す傷があった。アーマーのダメージの一部はかなりひどく、その操作が危ぶまれるほどであった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a Secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは巨大な技術司祭が身に纏っている希少なアーマーを、セキュタープレート機甲化スーツと特定した。それには多くの戦いが刻まれており、聖遺物であると示す傷があった。アーマーのダメージの一部はかなりひどく、その操作が危ぶまれるほどであった。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}你辨认出了身材壮硕的技术神甫穿着的护甲。这件机械化护甲是追击士专用的护甲，上面残留着无数战斗留下的印记。护甲上的标识表明这件护甲属于圣物，其中一部分损毁得相当严重，已经到了危及性能的程度。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a Secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你辨认出了身材壮硕的技术祭司穿着的护甲。这件机械化护甲是追击士专用的护甲，上面残留着无数战斗留下的印记。护甲上的标识表明这件护甲属于圣物，其中一部分损毁得相当严重，已经到了危及性能的程度。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Du identifizierst die seltene Rüstung des großen Techpriesters als mechanisierte Plattenpanzerung eines Secutors. Sie weist Spuren zahlreicher Kämpfe auf und hat Markierungen, die ihren Status als Relikt ausweisen. Einige Beschädigungen der Rüstung scheinen so schwer zu sein, dass sogar ihre Funktionstüchtigkeit gefährdet ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a Secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du identifizierst die seltene Rüstung des großen Techpriesters als mechanisierte Plattenpanzerung eines Secutors. Sie weist Spuren zahlreicher Kämpfe auf und hat Markierungen, die ihren Status als Relikt ausweisen. Einige Beschädigungen der Rüstung scheinen so schwer zu sein, dass sogar ihre Funktionstüchtigkeit gefährdet ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Vous reconnaissez dans l'armure rare dont l'énorme technoprêtre est vêtu l'exosquelette blindé et automatisé d'un secutor. Il porte les traces de nombreuses batailles ainsi que des symboles témoignant de son statut de relique. Certaines de ces avaries ont l'air sérieuses, au point de compromettre son bon fonctionnement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a Secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous reconnaissez dans l'armure rare dont l'énorme technoprêtre est vêtu l'exosquelette blindé et automatisé d'un secutor. Il porte les traces de nombreuses batailles ainsi que des symboles témoignant de son statut de relique. Certaines de ces avaries ont l'air sérieuses, au point de compromettre son bon fonctionnement.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Identificas la peculiar armadura que viste el descomunal tecnosacerdote como un blindaje de secutor mecanizado y acorazado. Luce las marcas de un sinfín de combates y tiene ornamentos que evidencian su condición de reliquia. Parte de los daños sufridos por la armadura parecen bastante graves, hasta el punto de poner en peligro su operatividad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a Secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Identificas la peculiar armadura que viste el descomunal tecnosacerdote como un blindaje de secutor mecanizado y acorazado. Luce las marcas de un sinfín de combates y tiene ornamentos que evidencian su condición de reliquia. Parte de los daños sufridos por la armadura parecen bastante graves, hasta el punto de poner en peligro su operatividad.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Haşmetli Tekno Rahip'in giydiği nadir zırhın, Korutörlerin kullandığı mekanize kıyafet olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Üzerinde birçok muharebenin izini taşıyıp yadigâr statüsünde olduğunu belli eden işaretler barındırıyor. Zırhtaki hasarın bir kısmı, onu işlevsiz hâle getirebilecek kadar ağır görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify the rare armour the enormous Tech-Priest is wearing as a Secutor's plated, mechanised suit. It carries the imprints of many battles and has markings that announce its status as a relic. Some of the armour's damage looks fairly severe, to the point of endangering its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Haşmetli Tekno Rahip'in giydiği nadir zırhın, Korutörlerin kullandığı mekanize kıyafet olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Üzerinde birçok muharebenin izini taşıyor ve bir yadigâr statüsünde olduğunu belli eden işaretlere sahip. Zırhtaki hasarın bir kısmı, onu neredeyse işlevsiz hâle getirebilecek kadar ağır görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tarzus
